narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Carole Bullard is a Speech-Language Pathologist,   provider based in Waco, TX. From 2024-03 through 2024-11, this provider received $133K in Medicaid payments across 1K claims serving 393 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 1.9× the national median for 92507 (92507), at $96 per claim vs. the median of $49, placing them above the 90th percentile.
100% of billing is concentrated in 92507 (92507), indicating significant specialization in this service.
